Class MyBatisCursorItemReaderBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
org.mybatis.spring.batch.builder.MyBatisCursorItemReaderBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the generic type
public class MyBatisCursorItemReaderBuilder<T> extends Object
A builder for the MyBatisCursorItemReader.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Kazuki Shimizu
